channel.title: It's posible implement others languages to user final in the visualizations data especificly?
channel.description: it's posible to change somes word about options that apparence to visualizations of dashboard? for example: if my the users final is latin american, they need to read at spanish "download plot as png" = "Descargar en formato PNG" "close" = "Cerrar"

item.title: It's posible implement others languages to user final in the visualizations data especificly?
item.dc:creator: nanval.cx
item.description:
it’s posible to change somes word about options that apparence to visualizations of dashboard?
for example: if my the users final is latin american, they need to read at spanish
“download plot as png” = “Descargar en formato PNG”
“close” = “Cerrar”

Read full topic
item.source: It's posible implement others languages to user final in the visualizations data especificly?
